title: Python Fundamentals
description: Variables, data types, and basic syntax
practiceSnippet:
# Python basics
name = 'Laasya'
age = 20

def greet(name):
    return f'Hello, {name}!'

print(greet(name))

title: Python Functions & Modules
description: Creating reusable functions and importing modules
practiceSnippet:
def calculate_xp(lessons_completed):
    base_xp = 10
    bonus = lessons_completed * 2
    return base_xp * lessons_completed + bonus

print(calculate_xp(5))
